name: Natural Henna Cone
description: Premium black henna cone made from 100% natural ingredients. Perfect for beginners and professionals. Lasts 1-2 weeks on skin.

name: Henna Paste Kit
description: Complete kit with henna powder, essential oils, and applicator. Includes instructions for DIY mehndi at home. Skin-safe and chemical-free.

name: Organic Henna Dye
description: Ready-to-use organic henna dye in a tube. Rich brown color, easy application for temporary tattoos. Vegan and allergy-tested.

name: Mehndi Design Stencils
description: Set of 10 reusable stencils for intricate patterns. Ideal for bridal or festival designs. Made from durable plastic.
